about.welcome-text: Lytale is a Hytale server that immerses you in a world devastated by 67 years of war between the Empire and the Democratic Alliance. Here, your decisions matter as much as your sword.
about.welcome-text2: More than just a survival experience, Lytale is an interactive RPG world where three visions of the future collide, and you decide which side of history you will write.
about.theWorld: The World of Blood and Ice
about.theWorld-text: The conflict between blood and ice has left scars across every corner of the world. Three figures emerge as catalysts of change:
about.theWorld-william: William Kerch is a brilliant and pragmatic strategist who manipulates his own faction to end the war, not for power, but to achieve peace.
about.theWorld-ludwig: An 18-year-old imperial deserter who uncovers the corruption of both factions. He leads a third path: a rebellion that seeks to destroy both authoritarian systems.
about.theWorld-rudeus: A 25-year-old Imperial Major and brilliant strategist who seeks to reform the Empire from within while watching the pieces move toward total war.
about.gameplay-1text: Explore a persistent open world where you build your base, form alliances, and survive in lands scarred by war. Your constructions and progress are permanent.
about.gameplay-2text: Delve into instanced dungeons designed for groups. Imperial fortresses, ancient temples, and forgotten battlefields await with unique rewards.
about.gameplay-3text: Complete narrative-driven quests that affect the server’s story. Your decisions in quest chains determine which faction gains power and how the conflict evolves.
about.gameplay-4text: Join the Empire, the Democratic Alliance, or Ludwig’s Rebellion. Each faction has its own bases, exclusive missions, and conflicting goals.
about.features-2text: Faction-based trading system and a neutral marketplace
about.features-4text: Well-designed progression system for character attributes
about.features-6text: Season-based chapters where players actively influence the story
about.joinCta-text: Three men, three visions of the future, destined to collide in a conflict that will decide whether the war ends in true peace or in the blood of millions.
about.joinCta-msj: Which side of history will you stand on?
